name: Moonkite
description: The Moonkite is a large celestial creature that embodies goodness and light, with striking wings and a radiant presence.
memorable: It serves as a protector, equipped with various magical abilities, and can teleport to different planes.
goals: To guide and protect those in need, using its powers to combat evil.
relations: Associated with other celestial beings, often working alongside divine allies.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or areas infused with radiant energy.
strengths: High flying speed and mobility, multiple powerful ranged and melee attacks, and strong defenses against magical effects.
weaknesses: Does not excel in traditional melee combat; relies on mobility and special abilities.
attacks: Can unleash four wing buffet attacks or two radiant arrow attacks, dealing radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Planar Traveler allows it to teleport itself and a willing rider to another plane of existence.
senses: Blindsight up to 120 ft., allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Proficient in insight, perception, and religion, showcasing its celestial knowledge and acute awareness.
additional_information: Immune to poison and resistant to fire and radiant damage.
Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Condition immunities include blinded, exhausted, frightened, and poisoned.
Magical weapon attacks can bypass defenses of many creatures.
Ability to ignore difficult terrain and nonmagical restraints.
test_queries: large celestial creature that flies fast
agile celestial being with teleport ability
